review: the movie starts with sandra living with her two kids in a mansion located in the outskirts of town. sandra doesn't even want to accept that that she and her children are dead until john, a man who resemble the same appearance of her husband comes into their lives and only to realise the late fact that her husband is dead and so are they.  a complicated and mystery solving and thriller movie.  it's requires good analysis  of the movie as the movie  needs a bit of good understanding.
